skill.name: agent.skills.GoGetDecontaminated
skill.description: For the agent, to get decontaminated by a decontamination plot. The agent moves toward the chosen decontamination plot. Once it is reached, the agent requests for decontamination. To be decontaminated, the decontamination plot needs to be operated by specific units.

parameter.name: decontaminationPlot
parameter.description: The decontamination plot the agent can use to get decontaminated.

parameter.name: meetingPoint
parameter.description: The position to reach once the agent has been decontaminated.

link.name: moveToward
link.description: To enact the decision to reach the decontamination plot.

link.name: getDecontaminated
link.description: To enact the decision of being decontaminated.
